title: Define System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the EdgeComputingOrchestrator system, considering edge devices, load balancing, data privacy and security.

title: Create Data Privacy Policy Document
description: Draft a comprehensive data privacy policy for the EdgeComputingOrchestrator system, addressing data collection, storage, and sharing.

title: Design Edge Device Interaction Protocol
description: Create a protocol for interaction between the central system and edge devices.

title: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
description: Design and implement a user-friendly interface for managing the EdgeComputingOrchestrator.

title: Implement Backend Logic for Load Balancing
description: Write the backend logic to ensure optimal load distribution across edge devices.

title: Implement Data Privacy Measures in Backend
description: Add privacy controls to the backend to protect user data according to the established policy.

title: Test EdgeComputingOrchestrator System Components
description: Perform extensive testing on each component of the EdgeComputingOrchestrator system to ensure proper functionality.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
Implement Backend Logic for Load Balancing
Implement Data Privacy Measures in Backend

title: Document System Functionality and Usage
description: Write clear, concise documentation explaining the system's functionality and usage for end-users.
dependencies: Develop Frontend Interface for User Interaction
